cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with network coding, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). It also discusses the issue of untrusted nodes, which falls under the category of network security (cs.NI) and cryptography (cs.CR). The paper proposes a broadcast transformation, which involves limiting the number of transmissions per generation, and this is a topic in distributed computing (cs.DC). Finally, the paper discusses the achievable transmission rate in the presence of adversaries, which is a topic in systems and control (cs.SI).
